content: A thread that I will list any fun, exciting, new, missed here items from Ebay.None of the items are mine or associated to me in any way."Parabolic Bitcoin"50.8mm x 3.2mmhttps://www.ebay.com/itm/204018159831

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: What a really cool concept, I wish I new about this earlier (going to call my local chains just in case they have any left):https://www.whichwich.com/cryptobox/What I think is interesting is this " Cryptocoins are valid for two years from April 29, 2022".  I guess they wanted to limit their liability, as these are currently worth about $10.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Bitcoin Mario or Mario Crypto (depending on the seller)https://www.ebay.com/itm/204029607007https://www.ebay.com/itm/144611500015(There are a few sellers, so please DYOR before buying)

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: i wonder if all those sellers are the same person - several that i looked at were different sellers but all were shipping from the same city and state.

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Quote from: Markzellers on July 06, 2022, 01:39:43 PMWhat a really cool concept, I wish I new about this earlier (going to call my local chains just in case they have any left):https://www.whichwich.com/cryptobox/What I think is interesting is this " Cryptocoins are valid for two years from April 29, 2022".  I guess they wanted to limit their liability, as these are currently worth about $10.I decided to have lunch at Wich Wich today and got the crypto box. $16 for the sandwich, chips, drink, cookie, coin pack and box.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: thanks for sharing @Steeley - I just did some looking and there are a few here by me, I need to check and see if they have the same package! otherwise I might hit you up to get me a coin - you'll get a free lunch out of it as I dont think the food would hold up for shipping lol

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on July 13, 2022, 11:46:50 PMthanks for sharing @Steeley - I just did some looking and there are a few here by me, I need to check and see if they have the same package! otherwise I might hit you up to get me a coin - you'll get a free lunch out of it as I dont think the food would hold up for shipping lolHappy to do this! Free lunch for me and a collectible for you or anyone that wants it. Steeley

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: I found a location that was willing to ship them to me at $15 face value.  I added a 20% tip and paid like $10 shipping.  I ordered 14 in case anyone wants one. I  am into them for about $19 I guess, I would be happy to send a few if anyone wants one.Thanks!It's a New Mexico location and they do have more if anyone else wants some.  I am sure they would ship more as the franchise makes out like a bandit.  Most locations sent back the coins, but Which Wich allowed each location to decide to keep the coins or send them back, so likely there are other locations that still have some.
